column4: One question, i just deleted some files on my usb-stick but there is still space in use ...
how can i format or delete the files on my usb disk so that all space is available again ?
the usb disk is empty but still 84 mb from 512 available :(
see if it put it into a hidden directory called .Trash-001 or something similar. from the command lin cd to your usb and type ls -la
